Articles.Content: ~Have we got a due out date yet for 0.24?

Not yet. But the NASA Mission update is out, with new parts and asteroids. You could give Kerbin like, 10 moons if you wanted to.

There's the video I watched.

Asking for due dates is against the Community Rules, rule 2.3c. This is because not only are release dates either not given before release or only when the developers are confident that they can give an accurate estimate, but also because discussion of release dates often quickly just turns into wild speculation and inevitably devolves into arguments.

As such, thread closed.
